movies.title: Pearl
movies.description: In 1918, a young woman living on her parents' farm dreams of a life beyond the countryside, but must face the darkness within herself.

movies.title: X
movies.description: In 1979, a group of young filmmakers set out to make an adult film in rural Texas, but when their elderly hosts catch them, the cast finds themselves fighting for their lives.

movies.title: MaXXXine
movies.description: In 1980s Hollywood, adult film star Maxine Minx finally gets her big break, but a mysterious killer stalks the starlets of Los Angeles.

movies.title: The Shining
movies.description: A family heads to an isolated hotel for the winter where a sinister presence influences the father into violence, while his psychic son sees horrific forebodings.

movies.title: Pulp Fiction
movies.description: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster and his wife intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.

movies.title: The Shape of Water
movies.description: At a top secret research facility in the 1960s, a lonely janitor forms a unique relationship with an amphibious creature that is being held in captivity.

movies.title: Pan's Labyrinth
movies.description: In the Falangist Spain of 1944, a bookish young stepdaughter of a sadistic army officer escapes into an eerie but captivating fantasy world.

movies.title: Kung Fu Hustle
movies.description: In Shanghai during the 1940s, a wannabe gangster aspires to join the notorious Axe Gang while residents of a housing complex exhibit extraordinary powers.

movies.title: The Grand Budapest Hotel
movies.description: A writer encounters the owner of an aging high-class hotel, who tells him of his early years serving as a lobby boy in the hotel's glorious years under a legendary concierge.

movies.title: My Neighbor Totoro
movies.description: When two girls move to the country to be near their ailing mother, they have adventures with the wondrous forest spirits who live nearby.

movies.title: The Life Aquatic with Steve Zissou
movies.description: With a plan to exact revenge on a mythical shark that killed his partner, oceanographer Steve Zissou rallies a crew that includes his estranged wife, a journalist, and a man who may be his son.

movies.title: It's a Wonderful Life
movies.description: An angel is sent from Heaven to help a desperately frustrated businessman by showing him what life would have been like if he had never existed.

movies.title: Spirited Away
movies.description: During her family's move to the suburbs, a sullen 10-year-old girl wanders into a world ruled by gods, witches, and spirits, and where humans are changed into beasts.

movies.title: Parasite
movies.description: Greed and class discrimination threaten the newly formed symbiotic relationship between the wealthy Park family and the destitute Kim clan.

movies.title: The Menu
movies.description: A couple travels to a coastal island to eat at an exclusive restaurant where the chef has prepared a lavish menu, with some shocking surprises.

movies.title: Life of Pi
movies.description: A young man who survives a disaster at sea is hurtled into an epic journey of adventure and discovery. While cast away, he forms an unexpected connection with another survivor: a fearsome Bengal tiger.

movies.title: Isle of Dogs
movies.description: Set in Japan, Isle of Dogs follows a boy's odyssey in search of his lost dog on a trash island populated by dogs that were banished by a corrupt mayor.

movies.title: Fight Club
movies.description: An insomniac office worker and a devil-may-care soap maker form an underground fight club that evolves into much more.

movies.title: Chicago
movies.description: Two death-row murderesses develop a fierce rivalry while competing for publicity, celebrity, and a sleazy lawyer's attention.

movies.title: Her
movies.description: In a near future, a lonely writer develops an unlikely relationship with an operating system designed to meet his every need.

movies.title: Once Upon a Time in Hollywood
movies.description: A faded television actor and his stunt double strive to achieve fame and success in the final years of Hollywood's Golden Age in 1969 Los Angeles.

movies.title: Django Unchained
movies.description: With the help of a German bounty-hunter, a freed slave sets out to rescue his wife from a brutal plantation owner in Mississippi.

movies.title: Fury
movies.description: A grizzled tank commander makes tough decisions as he and his crew fight their way across Germany in April 1945.

movies.title: Inglourious Basterds
movies.description: In Nazi-occupied France during World War II, a plan to assassinate Nazi leaders by a group of Jewish U.S. soldiers coincides with a theatre owner's vengeful plans for the same.

movies.title: Arrival
movies.description: A linguist works with the military to communicate with alien lifeforms after twelve mysterious spacecraft appear around the world.

movies.title: The Irishman
movies.description: An old hitman recalls his possible involvement with the slaying of Jimmy Hoffa and his journey through the ranks of organized crime.

movies.title: Monty Python's Life of Brian
movies.description: Born on the original Christmas in the stable next door to Jesus Christ, Brian of Nazareth spends his life being mistaken for a messiah.

movies.title: Palm Springs
movies.description: Stuck in a time loop, two wedding guests develop a budding romance while living the same day over and over again.

movies.title: Elite Squad
movies.description: In 1997 Rio de Janeiro, Captain Nascimento has to find a substitute for his position while trying to take down drug dealers and criminals before the Pope visits.

movies.title: The Shawshank Redemption
movies.description: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

movies.title: The Boy in the Striped Pyjamas
movies.description: Through the innocent eyes of Bruno, the eight-year-old son of the commandant at a concentration camp, a forbidden friendship with a Jewish boy on the other side of the camp fence has startling consequences.

movies.title: Cinema Paradiso
movies.description: A filmmaker recalls his childhood when falling in love with the pictures at the cinema of his home village and forms a deep friendship with the cinema's projectionist.

movies.title: The Beach
movies.description: On vacation in Thailand, Richard sets out for an island rumored to be a solitary beach paradise, but discovers that the commune residing there is not as idyllic as it seems.

movies.title: Blade Runner
movies.description: A blade runner must pursue and terminate four replicants who stole a ship in space and have returned to Earth to find their creator.

tvShows.title: Arcane
tvShows.description: Set in utopian Piltover and the oppressed underground of Zaun, the story follows the origins of two iconic League Of Legends champions-and the power that will tear them apart.

tvShows.title: Love, Death & Robots
tvShows.description: A collection of animated short stories that span various genres including science fiction, fantasy, horror and comedy.

tvShows.title: Lost
tvShows.description: The survivors of a plane crash are forced to work together in order to survive on a seemingly deserted tropical island.

tvShows.title: Shameless
tvShows.description: A scrappy, fiercely loyal Chicago family makes no apologies as they survive life in the margins of contemporary America.

tvShows.title: Sh≈çgun
tvShows.description: An English navigator becomes both a player and pawn in the complex political games in feudal Japan.
